Harvard Business School (abbv: HBS) is the graduate business school of Harvard University. It is located in Boston, Massachusetts. It is one of the the top business schools in the world. It offers a wide full-time MBA program, management-related doctoral programs, and many leadership education programs.
It owns Harvard Business Publishing. The company publishes business books, leadership articles, case studies, and the monthly "Harvard Business Review". It is also where the Baker Library/Bloomberg Center is.
